## Elden Ring - Game's Highly Anticipated Release

Elden Ring is an upcoming action role-playing game developed by FromSoftware and published by Bandai Namco Entertainment. The game was announced at E3 2019, and fans have been eagerly waiting for its release ever since. Elden Ring is directed by Hidetaka Miyazaki, who is known for his work on the Dark Souls series and Bloodborne.

### Development of Elden Ring

The development of Elden Ring started in early 2017, after the release of the Bloodborne expansion, The Old Hunters. According to Hidetaka Miyazaki, Elden Ring is a collaboration between him and George R. R. Martin, the author of A Song of Ice and Fire series, which served as the basis for the TV series Game of Thrones. The game's world and mythos were created by George R. R. Martin, while Hidetaka Miyazaki designed the game's mechanics and gameplay.

### Storyline of Elden Ring

Elden Ring's storyline is set in a mystical world called The Lands Between, which is ruled by powerful and immortal beings known as The Great Runes. The player will take on the role of a Tarnished, a creature rejected by The Great Runes, and tasked with finding the Elden Ring, a powerful artifact that once held The Great Runes together. The game's story will be told through a mix of in-game events, cutscenes, and lore.

### Gameplay of Elden Ring

Elden Ring's gameplay is similar to that of FromSoftware's previous games, such as Dark Souls and Bloodborne. The player will explore a vast open world, fight challenging enemies, and collect loot and equipment. The game's combat is said to be more dynamic and fluid than its predecessors, and will feature a variety of weapons and abilities. Elden Ring will also have online multiplayer modes, allowing players to team up and take on challenging bosses together.

### Release Date and Platforms

Elden Ring is set to release on January 21, 2022, for PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Xbox Series X/S, Xbox One, and PC. The game is available for pre-order on all platforms.

### Conclusion

Elden Ring is one of the most highly anticipated games of 2022, and for good reason. Its collaboration between Hidetaka Miyazaki and George R. R. Martin, and its promise of challenging gameplay and an immersive world are sure to excite fans of action role-playing games. With its release just around the corner, it's time to get ready to embark on a journey through The Lands Between and find the Elden Ring.
